Question.Subject: I can't make a formspring account?
Question.Content: I've tried three times now, and it says there's an error, or that my password doesn't match, or that my username doesn't exist? :/
Question.ChosenAnswer: Formspring is always having problems, it's a developing site. Try again in a bit. But for your passwords not matching, try typing a bit slower. That's just saying that you most likely made a typo in one of them. ^-^ ♥

Answer.Content: Formspring is always having problems, it's a developing site. Try again in a bit. But for your passwords not matching, try typing a bit slower. That's just saying that you most likely made a typo in one of them. ^-^ ♥
omg that happened to me. I keep trying to change my profile photo and it says "passwords do not match" even though i didnt type in any password!!!! ='(
